actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Charles R. Davis, Glena R. Faris, James E. Lampley, Rubin Leskoff, Joseph R. Loller, Barry M. Murphy, Claude T. Pearce, William V. Pippin, Wesley Richards, Robert D. Ridley, and Berry E. Skinner.
